name: Under the Moon (kenmeinakami)
description:
Your hunting for food when you got cursed, will you be able to overcome your struggles.

This is an iso combat game where you fight tiny gnomes.

This game was made by one person, for the ludum dare 50 and took just under 24 hours of works.

Control:

Xbox Controller:
Move:   Left joystick
Strike Attack: Button A
Turn Attack:   Button B 

Mouse Keybord:
Move:   WASD / ZQSD
Strike Attack: Mouse left click
Turn Attack:   Mouse right click
